articles.author: Tasmin Lockwood
articles.title: Capital One drops 6%, other banks hit after Trump calls for credit card rate cap - CNBC
articles.description: Posting on Truth Social, Trump said he would "no longer let the American Public be 'ripped off' by Credit Card Companies."
articles.content:
Banks and financial services stocks slid Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump called for a 10%, one-year cap on credit card interest rates. 
Capital One shares dropped 6% in midday trading and S… [+2557 chars]

articles.title: Fireball seen across the sky in Southern California on Saturday night - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: The American Meteor Society confirmed the Saturday night sighting was definitely a fireball, and not a rocket launch or satellite reentry. Did you see it?
articles.content:
GLENDALE, Calif. (KABC) -- A fireball was seen streaking across the sky in Southern California on Saturday night!
ABC7 director Mike Gilbert captured video of the fireball from our studios in Glenda… [+654 chars]
